com.simsilica.es.server

Class EntityDataWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.es.server.EntityDataWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.simsilica.es.EntityData, com.simsilica.es.ObservableEntityData

    public class EntityDataWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.simsilica.es.ObservableEntityData
    Wraps a delegate EntityData and passes most calls directly through but accumulates EventChanges in its own queue to be applied at a later time. EntitySets and WatchedEntities are created locally to this this EntityDataWrapper so that they don't get entity change notifications until later snapshot processing.

    The main purpose of this wrapper is to have a consistent view between the EntityChanges applied and what the EntitySets have queued. This facilitates sending appropriate changes to the client 'mirror' of this data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  EntityDataWrapper.LocalEntitySet
      A local DefaultEntitySet subclass only so that we can have access to some protected methods and potentially hook into some other stuff.
